settings.question: Natural Health Supplements & Organic Health Products
settings.answer_body1: At Well Well Well we are your most trusted natural health supplements online retailer. We make certain that we source the best natural health products from our distributors. When looking for a natural health supplement store 'near me', Well Well Well is your one stop shop.

settings.question: What is the difference between organic and natural health supplements?
settings.answer_body1: With many natural health products available for consumption it is hard to know what is the most effective product with branding and advertising companies using words like 'natural' and ‘organic’. Verified organic products have an accredited certifying agent stamp on the package. It is important to buy your natural health vitamins or supplements from your trusted retailer in Canada or worldwide.

settings.question: How can men and women benefit from natural supplements?
settings.answer_body1: Men and women can benefit from the best natural health supplements for aging bones, energy and anti-aging. Prevention can go a long way for a long healthy life. These things can include taking a daily multivitamin or even the addition of vitamin C, vitamin D and fish oil.

settings.question: What types of mental health and neurological challenges can natural health supplements support?
settings.answer_body1: Buying non or organic health supplements in Canada or anywhere, for mental health and neurological challenges can be difficult. Working with a health care practitioner can be the best way to correctly identify the root cause as well as treatment.

settings.question: How are natural health products regulated in Canada?
settings.answer_body1: Natural health products by distributors in Canada are regulated by Health Canada with designated natural product number (NPN) numbers. When you buy natural health supplements online manufactured in Canada these will have NPN numbers. We are your trusted source so when looking for a natural health supplement store 'near me', Well Well Well is your one stop shop.

settings.question: What are the most popular natural health supplements?
settings.answer_body1: The most common and popular natural and organic health supplements for sale in store and online in Canada are Vitamin C and Vitamin D. Seasonal changes and location can also affect sales and popularity of products. Also, the average age in the location also can dictate the popularity of a product. The best health supplements for cities often are stress and sleep related.

settings.question: How are natural health products regulated in Canada?
settings.answer_body1: All natural health products (NHPs) must be approved by Health Canada before they are allowed to be legally sold in Canada. In Canada all natural supplements for health have a Natural Product Number (NPN) or Homeopathic Medicine Number (DIN-HM) on the product’s label, which indicates that it has been approved by Health Canada.

settings.question: What do natural health products include?
settings.answer_body1: Canadian regulated natural health products include an NPN number as well as a complete ingredients list, recommended adult dosage and caution regulation. The most common natural supplement for health is a multivitamin, which includes a blend of vitamins, minerals, herbs, amino acids, enzymes and greens. Other natural health products can include organic health supplements that are specific vitamins and minerals (such as Vit C, Vit D or Calcium).

settings.question: How do you find a natural product number?
settings.answer_body1: If you are looking for more information about a specific product, across the board in all categories such as Women’s Health, Men’s Health, Menopause and Allergies/Sinus to mention a few, there will be a contact number to the company, and in Canada a Natural Product Number (NPN).

settings.question: Are natural supplements good for you?
settings.answer_body1: Before buying natural health supplements online, it is always important to never self diagnose, treat, or attempt to cure, and always check with your doctor and pharmacist for potential contraindications with your natural and non-prescription remedies. Going to your trusted health food store will ensure that you find the safest natural supplements for health according to your needs. There are many benefits to natural health products, for all ages and all moments in your life.
